Our Expertise

Specialized construction solutions for the most demanding industries

💊

Pharmaceutical & Life Sciences

GMP-ready production facilities, cleanrooms, sterile manufacturing, and packaging operations built to FDA and Health Canada standards.

🔒

Mission Critical

High-security critical facilities including courthouses, detention centers, data centers, and infrastructure requiring zero downtime.

🏢

Civic & Commercial

Government buildings, schools, commercial spaces, and institutional projects with focus on quality and regulatory compliance.

🏥

Healthcare

Medical facilities, laboratories, testing centers, and healthcare infrastructure designed for optimal patient care and research.

Life Sciences Facility Expertise

Our team excels in delivering state-of-the-art facilities that meet the unique needs of pharmaceutical companies. We create environments that foster innovation and discovery.

✓ Biologics Production
✓ Sterile Manufacturing

Our Services

Comprehensive construction services from concept to completion

📑

Design-Bid-Build

Traditional approach with detailed planning and external design teams. We competitively bid on fully-designed projects, ensuring transparent pricing and clear scope.

  • •Complete design documentation
  • •Competitive bidding process
  • •Clear cost certainty
Popular
🛠

Design-Build

Integrated approach combining design and construction under one contract. Faster delivery, streamlined communication, and single-point accountability.

  • •Single point of contact
  • •Accelerated schedules
  • •Value engineering included
📋

Construction Management

Flexible approach allowing scope evolution during construction. We manage all trades while you maintain control over design decisions.

  • •Flexible scope adjustments
  • •Transparent cost tracking
  • •Owner-controlled changes

About Mavcor Inc.

Established in 2015 and led by President Nicholas Mucci, Mavcor Inc. has quickly become a key player in the life sciences construction industry. With over three decades of combined experience, we blend technical expertise, innovation, and collaboration to deliver high-quality, custom-built spaces.

"We look at the big picture. We structure teams, coordinate supply chains, and guide all professionals toward a shared goal."

— Nicholas Mucci, President
🏆

Award-Winning Excellence

Named Life Sciences Construction Services of the Year - Canada 2025

🌎

Cross-Border Operations

Offices in Toronto, Eastern Ontario, and the United States

Featured Projects

A showcase of precision engineering and construction excellence

💊
Pharmaceutical

Eurofins Alphora GMP Facility

Interior alterations transforming 3-level office space into GMP formulation, testing, and storage facility with single-pass HEPA air and explosion-proof rated cleanrooms.

🏢
Mission Critical

Ontario Superior Courthouse

High-security civic facility with specialized infrastructure, advanced security systems, and precision construction for critical government operations.

🔬
Life Sciences

Biosafety Level 3 Laboratory

State-of-the-art containment laboratory featuring negative pressure rooms, specialized HVAC, and complete regulatory compliance for advanced research.
